Launching UCS Accelerated Deployment Assistant

Prerequisite: A license should be generated from DCAF Portal. The license file contains the information of customer name, site name etc. Based on the license type, the services are enabled.
Contact dcv-support@cisco.com for more information or issues.

Launch the UCS Accelerated Deployment Assistant from your web browser.

 1. Navigate to https://ucsada.cloudapps.cisco.com/ using supported browser.

Figure 1-1 Login

 2. Enter the Username and Password.

 3. Click Log In, the License Upload screen appears.

Note The License Key to Activate screen appears when the system is setup initially.

 4. Click Upload to upload the license file. The license file contains the information of customer name, site name and so on. If you have any issues in obtaining the license, contact dcv-support@cisco.com.

On successful uploading of the license file, the Project(s)/Domain screen appears.

Figure 1-2 Projects Screen

Note The various options are marked and highlighted in the above figure. Detailed procedures corresponding to these options are available in the next chapter.
